[docs]def open_serial(port, baudrate):
    device = serial.Serial(port, baudrate)
    time.sleep(1)
    return device



[docs]class MotionController:
    def __init__(self, serial_port='/dev/ttyACM0', baudrate=115200, test_mode=True):
        self.test_mode=test_mode
        self.baudrate = baudrate
        self.port = serial_port
        self.device = None
        self.current_position = None



[docs]    def connect(self):
        if self.test_mode:
            logging.info('Connected to virtual printer') 
            return True
        else:
            try:
                self.device = open_serial(self.port, self.baudrate)
                return True
            except:
                return False

                #sys.exit(0)



[docs]    def start(self):
        """wrapper function for connect() that prints out start banner and has delay."""
        self.connect()
        message = self.read()
        return message




[docs]    def send(self, message):
        """Sends a message to the device and returns the response message"""
        if self.test_mode:
            response="ok\n"
            return response
        else:
            message += '\r\n'
            self.device.write(message.encode('utf-8'))
            logging.info("message sent to printer: %s" % message)
            response = ''
            check = ''
            # waits to get entire message 
            while check != 'ok\n':
                check = self.device.readline().decode()
                response += check
                
            return response



[docs]    def read(self):
        response = ''
        while self.device.in_waiting > 0:
            response += self.device.readline().decode()
        return response

    


[docs]    def disconnect(self):
        if self.test_mode:
            logging.info("virtual motion disconnected")
            return True

        # close the serial connection
        try:
            self.device.close()
            logging.info('motion system disconnected')
            return True
        except:
            logging.info("Error closing connection.")
            return False
